snippet.title: Edge Of Eternity - Launch trailer Chapter 3: The Reunion
snippet.description:
Wage epic turn-based battles as you follow Daryon and Selene on their quest to find a cure to the all-consuming Corrosion in this grand tale of hope and sacrifice.

Discover the third chapter of Edge of Eternity: the Reunion, now out on PC! https://store.steampowered.com/app/269190/Edge_Of_Eternity/

For the latest news about Edge of Eternity, don't forget to follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EoeGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EoeGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/EoEgame

Please take the time to wishlist us on Steam if you're interested in the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/269190/Edge_Of_Eternity/

You can also follow Dear Villagers for more Edge of Eternity news:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DearVillagers/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dearvillagers
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dearvillagers/
